question: When is the ‘International Day of Family Remittances (IDFR)’ celebrated every year?
explanation:
‘International Day of Family Remittances (IDFR)’ is celebrated on June 16, every year across the world. 
The United Nations General Assembly declared IDFR to be celebrated on June 16. The day also recognizes the contribution of over 200 million migrants to improve the lives of their 800 million family members. The impact of the remittances on households, communities and countries is also focussed.
